mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, GENDER, (select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1 + 1 AS AGE,PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, IS_ADMIN FROM MEMBER_INFO
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN Gender = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as COUNT_MALE, SUM(CASE WHEN Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as COUNT_FEMALE FROM member_info

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=10 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) < 20 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "M_TEN", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>20 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) < 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "M_TWENTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=30 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <40 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "M_THIRTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=40 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <50 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "M_FOURTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=50 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "M_FIFTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <10 or ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) >60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "M_OTHER" FROM member_info WHERE GENDER='M'

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=10 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) < 20 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "F_TEN", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>20 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) < 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "F_TWENTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=30 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <40 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "F_THIRTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=40 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <50 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "F_FOURTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1)>=50 and ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "F_FIFTY", SUM(CASE WHEN ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) <10 or ((select extract(year from sysdate) from dual)-USER_BIRTH1+1) >60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "F_OTHER" FROM member_info WHERE GENDER='F'
